item.title: The Power of Negative Thinking on Diabetes
item.description: Black or African American adults were diagnosed with diabetes 24% more frequently than the total population in 2024. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Hypnosis Before Breast Cancer Surgery Eases Post-Op Symptoms

item.title: Tirzepatide Significantly Lowers Weight in Women With PCOS

item.title: A Low-Carb FIx for Depression?
item.description: Very low-carb, protein-rich diets can improve mood, a new study shows. Medscape Medical News
